attributes.action: Set a urgent date for a national vote on our continued membership of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lets stop the government from hiding behind EU laws on employment.
Opting out of the EU, would allow British jobs to be given to British people.
This petition could save yours or your families job, so send it on before its too late.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
